verses.esv: 33 I have said these things to you, that in me you may have peace. In the world you will have tribulation. But take heart; I have overcome the world.”
verses.kjv: 33 These things I have spoken unto you, that in me ye might have peace. In the world ye shall have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
verses.niv: 33 "I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."

verses.esv: 4 For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith.
verses.kjv: 4 For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
verses.niv: 4 for everyone born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world, even our faith.

verses.esv: 37 No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.
verses.kjv: 37 Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
verses.niv: 37 No, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him who loved us.

verses.esv: 12 Blessed is the man who remains steadfast under trial, for when he has stood the test he will receive the crown of life, which God has promised to those who love him.
verses.kjv: 12 Blessed is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.
verses.niv: 12 Blessed is the man who perseveres under trial, because when he has stood the test, he will receive the crown of life that God has promised to those who love him.

verses.esv: 4 Little children, you are from God and have overcome them, for he who is in you is greater than he who is in the world.
verses.kjv: 4 Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
verses.niv: 4 You, dear children, are from God and have overcome them, because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.

verses.esv: 5 Who is it that overcomes the world except the one who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.kjv: 5 Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.niv: 5 Who is it that overcomes the world? Only he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God.

verses.esv: 21 The one who conquers, I will grant him to sit with me on my throne, as I also conquered and sat down with my Father on his throne.
verses.kjv: 21 To him that overcometh will I grant to sit with me in my throne, even as I also overcame, and am set down with my Father in his throne.
verses.niv: 21 To him who overcomes, I will give the right to sit with me on my throne, just as I overcame and sat down with my Father on his throne.

verses.esv: 4 For everyone who has been born of God overcomes the world. And this is the victory that has overcome the world—our faith. 5 Who is it that overcomes the world except the one who believes that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.kjv: 4 For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith. 5 Who is he that overcometh the world, but he that believeth that Jesus is the Son of God?
verses.niv: 4 for everyone born of God overcomes the world. This is the victory that has overcome the world, even our faith. 5 Who is it that overcomes the world? Only he who believes that Jesus is the Son of God.

verses.esv: 5 The one who conquers will be clothed thus in white garments, and I will never blot his name out of the book of life. I will confess his name before my Father and before his angels.
verses.kjv: 5 He that overcometh, the same shall be clothed in white raiment; and I will not blot out his name out of the book of life, but I will confess his name before my Father, and before his angels.
verses.niv: 5 He who overcomes will, like them, be dressed in white. I will never blot out his name from the book of life, but will acknowledge his name before my Father and his angels.

verses.esv:
Of David.

27:1   The LORD is my light and my salvation;
    whom shall I fear?
  The LORD is the stronghold of my life;
    of whom shall I be afraid?
verses.kjv: 1 The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear? the LORD is the strength of my life; of whom shall I be afraid?
verses.niv: 1 The LORD is my light and my salvation- whom shall I fear? The LORD is the stronghold of my life- of whom shall I be afraid?

verses.esv: 7 casting all your anxieties on him, because he cares for you.
verses.kjv: 7 Casting all your care upon him; for he careth for you.
verses.niv: 7 Cast all your anxiety on him because he cares for you.

verses.esv:
13   For I, the LORD your God,
    hold your right hand;
  it is I who say to you, “Fear not,
    I am the one who helps you.”
verses.kjv: 13 For I the LORD thy God will hold thy right hand, saying unto thee, Fear not; I will help thee.
verses.niv: 13 For I am the LORD, your God, who takes hold of your right hand and says to you, Do not fear; I will help you.

verses.esv:
10   fear not, for I am with you;
    be not dismayed, for I am your God;
  I will strengthen you, I will help you,
    I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.
verses.kjv: 10 Fear thou not; for I am with thee: be not dismayed; for I am thy God: I will strengthen thee; yea, I will help thee; yea, I will uphold thee with the right hand of my righteousness.
verses.niv: 10 So do not fear, for I am with you; do not be dismayed, for I am your God. I will strengthen you and help you; I will uphold you with my righteous right hand.

verses.esv: 2 Count it all joy, my brothers, when you meet trials of various kinds, 3 for you know that the testing of your faith produces steadfastness. 4 And let steadfastness have its full effect, that you may be perfect and complete, lacking in nothing.
verses.kjv: 2 My brethren, count it all joy when ye fall into divers temptations; 3 Knowing this, that the trying of your faith worketh patience. 4 But let patience have her perfect work, that ye may be perfect and entire, wanting nothing.
verses.niv: 2 Consider it pure joy, my brothers, whenever you face trials of many kinds, 3 because you know that the testing of your faith develops perseverance. 4 Perseverance must finish its work so that you may be mature and complete, not lacking anything.

verses.esv: 11 Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil.
verses.kjv: 11 Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
verses.niv: 11 Put on the full armor of God so that you can take your stand against the devil's schemes.

verses.esv:
5   Trust in the LORD with all your heart,
    and do not lean on your own understanding.
6   In all your ways acknowledge him,
    and he will make straight your paths.
verses.kjv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all thine heart; and lean not unto thine own understanding. 6 In all thy ways acknowledge him, and he shall direct thy paths.
verses.niv: 5 Trust in the LORD with all your heart and lean not on your own understanding; 6 in all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.

verses.esv: 57 But thanks be to God, who gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.kjv: 57 But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
verses.niv: 57 But thanks be to God! He gives us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.esv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be frightened, and do not be dismayed, for the LORD your God is with you wherever you go.”
verses.kjv: 9 Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the LORD thy God is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
verses.niv: 9 Have I not commanded you? Be strong and courageous. Do not be terrified; do not be discouraged, for the LORD your God will be with you wherever you go."

verses.esv: 7 The one who conquers will have this heritage, and I will be his God and he will be my son.
verses.kjv: 7 He that overcometh shall inherit all things; and I will be his God, and he shall be my son.
verses.niv: 7 He who overcomes will inherit all this, and I will be his God and he will be my son.

verses.esv: 17 He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches. To the one who conquers I will give some of the hidden manna, and I will give him a white stone, with a new name written on the stone that no one knows except the one who receives it.’
verses.kjv: 17 He that hath an ear, let him hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches; To him that overcometh will I give to eat of the hidden manna, and will give him a white stone, and in the stone a new name written, which no man knoweth saving he that receiveth it.
verses.niv: 17 He who has an ear, let him hear what the Spirit says to the churches. To him who overcomes, I will give some of the hidden manna. I will also give him a white stone with a new name written on it, known only to him who receives it.

verses.esv: 18 There is no fear in love, but perfect love casts out fear. For fear has to do with punishment, and whoever fears has not been perfected in love.
verses.kjv: 18 There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.
verses.niv: 18 There is no fear in love. But perfect love drives out fear, because fear has to do with punishment. The one who fears is not made perfect in love.

verses.esv: 26 The one who conquers and who keeps my works until the end, to him I will give authority over the nations,
verses.kjv: 26 And he that overcometh, and keepeth my works unto the end, to him will I give power over the nations:
verses.niv: 26 To him who overcomes and does my will to the end, I will give authority over the nations--

verses.esv: 21 Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.
verses.kjv: 21 Be not overcome of evil, but overcome evil with good.
verses.niv: 21 Do not be overcome by evil, but overcome evil with good.

verses.esv: 11 And they have conquered him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony, for they loved not their lives even unto death.
verses.kjv: 11 And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
verses.niv: 11 They overcame him by the blood of the Lamb and by the word of their testimony; they did not love their lives so much as to shrink from death.

verses.esv: 13 I can do all things through him who strengthens me.
verses.kjv: 13 I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
verses.niv: 13 I can do everything through him who gives me strength.
